data.name: BluetoothNotification_Denied_ErrorText
data.value: Permission to use bluetooth was denied. Please, grant permission to use bluetooth in the application settings to proceed.

data.name: BluetoothNotification_Disabled_ErrorText
data.value: Bluetooth is currently unavailable. Either bluetooth is not supported by your device or it is disabled. Please, check device bluetooth settings.

data.name: BluetoothNotification_Error_Title
data.value: Bluetooth error.

data.name: BluetoothNotification_NotSupported_WarningText
data.value: Your device has some hardware limitations and might be invisible to other devices via Bluetooth.

data.name: BluetoothNotification_Warning_Title
data.value: Bluetooth warning.

data.name: OnBoardind_MadeForYou_SubTitle
data.value: Tailored for you

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_ErrorText
data.value: For this app to work and help save lives, please connect with bluetooth

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_Instruction1
data.value: 100% anonymous We do not know your name or location

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_Instruction2
data.value: This app uses bluetooth to trace if you've been in contact with someone who is infected

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_Instruction4_AndroidOnly
data.value: We will only use the bluetooth and not the location when you give permission

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_SubTitle
data.value: Connect with Bluetooth

data.name: OnBoarding_Connectivity_Title
data.value: Connectivity

data.name: OnBoarding_MadeForYou_Instruction1
data.value: Recommendations tailored to your profile category

data.name: OnBoarding_MadeForYou_Instruction2
data.value: Area specific risks, recommendations and behaviour rules

data.name: OnBoarding_MadeForYou_Instruction3
data.value: NO private information shared

data.name: OnBoarding_MadeForYou_Title
data.value: Made for you

data.name: OnBoarding_Next_Button_Text
data.value: Продолжить

data.name: OnBoarding_Notifications_ErrorText
data.value: For this app to work and help save lives, please allow notifications

data.name: OnBoarding_Notifications_Instruction1
data.value: Ваш аккаунт является конфиденциальным. Мы не храним никакой личной информации.

data.name: OnBoarding_Notifications_Instruction2
data.value: Мы не сохраняем вашу электронную почту или номер телефона, поэтому не будем отправлять вам письма или текстовые сообщения.

data.name: OnBoarding_Notifications_Instruction3
data.value: Уведомления будут отправляться только через приложение. Вы можете отключить уведомления в разделе "Настройки".

data.name: OnBoarding_Notifications_Title
data.value: Важная информация

data.name: OnBoarding_Privacy_Instruction1
data.value: All information transmitted via encryption

data.name: OnBoarding_Privacy_Instruction2
data.value: NO information is linked to your identity

data.name: OnBoarding_Privacy_Instruction3
data.value: NO personal information leaves your phone

data.name: OnBoarding_Privacy_SubTitle
data.value: Completely anonymous

data.name: OnBoarding_Privacy_Title
data.value: Privacy
